mapper.select: SELECT a.record_id as RecordId, a.exam_id as ExamId, a.answer_score as AnswerScore, a.create_time as CreateTime, a.user_id as UserId, b.exam_name as ExamName, b.exam_score as ExamMaxScore, b.exam_switch as Examswitch, b.exam_type as Examtype from exam_record a, exam b where a.user_id=#{userid} and a.exam_id=b.exam_id

select b.user_id as UserId, b.exam_id as ExamId, c.record_id as RecordId, c.answer_score as AnswerScore, c.create_time as CreateTime, d.nickname as NickName , d.classname as ClassName from
(SELECT * FROM final.exam_user a where a.exam_id=#{examid}) as b left join exam_record c on b.exam_id=c.exam_id and b.user_id=c.user_id left join t_user d on d.id=b.user_id;
